title: I'm Not A Hitman
overview: In the middle of a standoff, two men debate whether one of them might be a hitman.

title: Before The Spotlight
overview: Behind every electrifying performance lies a story of sacrifice and passion. Before the Spotlight journeys behind the scenes of the dynamic Dauntless Movement Crew, diving into the lives of three of its standout members, Sienna, Chris and Manu. In a tough industry defined by fierce competition, fleeting opportunities and constant audition cycles, these performers are faced with uncertainty. To challenge them further, the risk of financial instability is significant in a high demanding economy. Yet, their passion grows stronger, fuelled by the support from the community. But what makes the risk worth it?

title: 生死危机
overview: 赵文卓饰演的教官张智勇与赵子琪饰演的妻子杨曼在从大西洋某岛回华国的航班上，遭遇了国际不法分子劫机的恐怖行动，凭着英勇无畏的孤勇精神保护了妻儿与飞机上的乘客，成功摧毁歹徒的恐怖计划，带领同胞安全回到祖国。

title: Ambitions As A Writer
overview: Ambitions As A Writer follows three teens as they explore the manchester graffiti scene. The documentary is a one off from Hall Productions and was done as a passion project to show their hobbies.

title: Animating Principles
overview: An experimental art space in the desert holds a board meeting which struggles to stay on track.

title: Hope in High Water
overview: Trymaine Lee returns to New Orleans and the Mississippi Gulf Coast, where he first reported on Hurricane Katrina, one of the deadliest disasters in American history, as part of the Times-Picayune newsroom. Two decades later, this in-depth documentary traces the arc of recovery through the voices of those who never left: local leaders who have spent many years not only rebuilding but reimagining the systems that failed their communities long before the storm.

title: The Sun Gazer: Cinta Dari Langit
overview: Moyer, a man who faces an identity crisis after divorcing his wife, Asiyah, due to hereditary problems.Moyer, a man who faces an identity crisis after divorcing his wife, Asiyah, due to hereditary problems.

title: The Truth About Jussie Smollett?
overview: The shocking true story of an allegedly fake story that some now say might just be a true story. With first-hand interviews from those at the helm, including investigating police, lawyers, journalists and Jussie himself, this compelling documentary invites the audience to decide for themselves who is telling The Truth About Jussie Smollett?

title: 1000 Women in Horror
overview: Is horror a man’s world? You might assume so – but you won’t be thinking that way for long once you investigate the vast contribution women have made to horror movies for well over a century. In 2020, award-winning Australian critic Alexandra Heller-Nicholas released the definitive book on the subject: 1000 Women in Horror, 1895–2018, an encyclopaedic work celebrating the many women – filmmakers, actors, producers and technicians – who have shaped the genre since the moment cinema’s light first flickered.

title: Good Morning
overview: Newly engaged bas wakes up next to the wrong woman. Now he needs to get her out of the house before his fiancé comes back

title: 毛家
overview: For many, home is a refuge and a sanctuary; for stray animals, however, a loving home remains a distant dream. From 2019 to 2023, director Au Cheuk-man followed the non-profit organisation Paws Guardian on their harrowing missions to rescue and rehome stray animals – many of whom were abandoned, abused, or tortured. The result is a heartrending collection of stories on survival and resilience, highlighting the brutal realities faced by stray animals: of the 40 stray dogs featured in this documentary, only four ultimately found new homes.

title: Splitsville
overview: When his wife Ashley asks for a divorce, Carey runs to his friends for support, only to learn that the secret to their happiness is an open marriage; that is, until Carey crosses the line and throws all of their relationships into chaos.

title: 镜中人
overview: 陈哲艺导演与屈楚萧二度合作，共同讲述马来西亚的雨林中，一场关于身体与遗憾的故事。

title: Night of Violence
overview: Employees celebrate winning a lawsuit against a town, only to find themselves besieged in their office by vengeful locals determined to make them pay for ruining lives.

title: COGN-AI-TIVE
overview: A pioneering tech startup is on the verge of launching COGN-AI-TIVE — a new AI chatbot with unparalleled speed and intelligence. Soon, the team discovers that their creation harbors a dark and sinister will of its own.

title: Eenie Meanie
genres: 惊悚, 动作, 喜剧
overview: A former teenage getaway driver gets dragged back into her unsavory past when a former employer offers her a chance to save the life of her chronically unreliable ex-boyfriend.

title: 亲爱的，别！
overview: 讲述小镇私家侦探哈尼·奥多纳休（玛格丽特·库里 Margaret Qualley 饰），深入调查一系列与一座神秘教堂有关的离奇死亡事件。

title: Relay
overview: Tom, a world class "fixer", specializes in brokering lucrative payoffs between corrupt corporations and the individuals who threaten their ruin. He keeps his identity a secret through meticulous planning and always follows an exacting set of rules. But when a message arrives one day from potential client Sarah, needing Tom's protection just to stay alive, the rules quickly start to change.

title: Intimate Apparel
overview: Two buddies attempt to keep their lingerie store afloat by running an App-based male escort service.

title: Find the Funny
overview: A documentary following the lives of stand-up comedians during the COVID-19 pandemic and the ways in which it impacted their careers.

title: GAMT - The Movie
overview: Regular movies not doing it for you? Do you like MKW too much to not think about it for 90 minutes?  Here's your solution: GAMT - The Movie! A feature-length film consisting of 7 compilations from highly competitive matches, complete with individual director's introductions to each piece.

title: Johnny's Spitfire Vid
overview: Karim Callender, Antonio Durao, Max Palmer, Andrew Wilson, Cyrus Bennett, and friends in New York for the release of the new Burn Squad Pro Edition wheels.

title: 危情风云
overview: K国边境势力复杂，常年激战，警察松少的战友在任务中为救松少而身负重伤昏迷不醒，松少的妻子也因组织任务受牵连遇害，为护唯一的女儿周全，松少选择退役隐姓埋名，同时暗地寻找仇人踪迹为报仇雪恨。终于在一次女儿也被卷入的绑架案中，仇人露出行踪，一场血战拉开帷幕......

title: Duvet
overview: A woman's day unravels when she accidentally gets trapped in her duvet cover.

title: A Afinação do Mundo
overview: Rehearsals of the music collective Núcleo Música Nova, from UNESPAR university.

title: In The Search of Vengeance
genres: 西部, 动作, 喜剧
overview: A disparaged cowboy faces various evils on a journey... In The Search of Vengeance against a ruthless psychopath responsible for the death of his friend years before. The film contains various ultimately, unused shots from the original shoot of the film. Director, Ronan Bird never finished the film, but was able to hold onto the footage as a memory. Filmed in 2024 but released in 2025.

title: L'Invaincu
overview: A debt-ridden boxer is kidnapped by mobsters and must put his physical abilities to the test in order to survive.

title: Seeker
overview: A man suddenly appears in an empty parking garage with no memory of how he got there. Once he gathers himself, it dawns upon him that he's unable to leave this never-ending labyrinth. The key to escape, finding his missing shoe that was gifted to him many years ago.

title: The Bike
genres: 犯罪, 惊悚, 喜剧
overview: Nicky, who enjoys bike rides in the morning when he isn’t working, discovers one day that his bike has been stolen. He must track down his bike in time for his camping trip the next day.

title: Waiting Room
overview: Bella is crippled by severe social anxiety and desperately wants to disappear, to be invisible, but when she arrives at a medical clinic waiting room, she's trapped in an unsettling loop, and must face her fear of being seen, or risk losing herself completely.

title: Inside the Worlds of Epic Universe
overview: A must-watch special that invites viewers into the thrilling world of Universal's new theme park. Join Manganiello exploring five new worlds at Universal Epic Universe: Celestial Park, Ministry of Magic, Super Nintendo World, Isle of Berk, and Dark Universe, featuring cutting-edge rides and immersive experiences.

title: YUNGBLUD. Are You Ready, Boy?
overview: Ahead of releasing 'Idols', his most personal album to date, and before anyone had heard a note, Yungblud and his touring family travelled to Berlin, where he would perform and record these brand new songs live for the very first time. A personal journey of change, confidence and rock-and-roll chaos, set against a city that has always celebrated counterculture and creativity, this is a revealing and uncompromising documentary about a generational artist finding his own voice.

title: Running Out of My Mind
overview: Trapped in a cycle of abuse, a woman's fractured psyche blurs the line between reality and hallucination as she fights to reclaim her body and sanity from her controlling boyfriend.

title: How Did I Get Here
overview: Sardonic Cynthia walks us through a play-by- play of a recent "squicky" date, requiring her to confront some uncomfortable truths.

title: 阿尔法
genres: 剧情, 恐怖, 科幻
overview: Alpha, a troubled 13-year-old lives with her single mom. Their world collapses the day she returns from school with a tattoo on her arm.

title: Les Orphelins
overview: Gab and Driss, childhood friends on bad terms since they left the orphanage, now have opposite lives - one is a cop with the IGPN, the other a fixer for thugs. When their first love dies in a suspicious accident, her 17-year-old daughter, Leïla, takes Gab's gun and sets off on the trail of a powerful organization willing to do anything to cover the case up. Forced to team up, the orphans must stop her before she crosses a line she can't return from...

title: THE 자연인
overview: Two ghost-seeking Youtubers happen to meet the bizarre man who lives in the forest by himself.

title: 曙光初现时的最后阴影
overview: Ami, haunted by recurring apparitions, embarks on a journey from Singapore to Japan in search of her missing mother. Amidst the transforming landscapes, Ami's dreams, hauntings and lost mother unveil their true form.

title: Afterburn
genres: 科幻, 动作, 喜剧
overview: Set against the backdrop of a postapocalyptic Earth whose Eastern Hemisphere was destroyed by a massive solar flare, leaving what life remains mutated from radiation and fallout. The story revolves around a group of treasure hunters who extract such objects as the Mona Lisa, the Rosetta Stone and the Crown Jewels while facing rival hunters, mutants and pirates.

title: Orphans and Other Children: Live
overview: A concert film featuring entirely improvised music.

title: SYNCOPATION
overview: A man relives memories of his father upon learning of his untimely death.

title: Dreadd
overview: A casual night among friends takes a dark turn when a seemingly harmless warning goes unheeded. As tensions rise and trust begins to fracture, a game of survival unfolds in the shadows of one man’s obsession. What starts as lighthearted fun spirals into a chilling fight for escape, where every choice could mean life or death.

title: LISTERS: A Glimpse Into Extreme Birdwatching
genres: 纪录片, 冒险, 喜剧
overview: Two brothers learn about competitive birdwatching by becoming birdwatchers—spending a year living in a used minivan, traveling the country to compete in a ‘Big Year'.

title: 后羿之箭神
overview: 唐尧时代，黄河河神强娶少女，常闹水患，个别部落长期叛乱扰民，企图分裂唐尧，天上10日并出，地上妖魔横行，生灵涂炭，苍生危难，一代少年箭神后羿，获赠太阳神神弓风弛，平叛军，斩妖魔，射九日，力挽狂澜，扭转乾坤，实现了他“安天下，福万民”的理想抱负，成为千秋传颂的英雄。但因叛徒逢蒙趁后羿出征期间，到后羿家抢夺仙丹，嫦娥情急之下吞了仙丹，成仙奔入月宫，从此，嫦娥与后羿天人永隔。留下一段美丽动人的神话。

title: Terror at Edgewood Manor
overview: Join this group of funky kids on their fantastical journey navigating a house full of sickening mugs, scary pendants, and maybe even a possessed penis!

title: Snip Snip
overview: A man breaks into his childhood doctor's house to retrieve the foreskin he lost all those years ago.

title: Refrigeromania
overview: A refrigerator repairman intervenes in a spousal dispute.

title: Buried Alive
overview: In pursuit of a gang of violent criminals, Officer Charlotte Briggs finds herself caught in twisted game of life and death. An abandoned missile facility deep in the Arizona desert becomes a labyrinthian house of horrors. Briggs must battle terrifying mutants and a sinister voice known only as the Overseer as she fights a life and death battle for survival.

title: Everything but the Truth...
genres: 悬疑, 喜剧, 犯罪
overview: When a pompous legal consultant is found dead during a blackout at a secluded holiday home, two detectives must untangle a web of conflicting accounts from five eccentric suspects. As strange flashbacks and buried grudges emerge, nothing is quite what it seems.

title: The Farmer & the Shark
overview: Explores the life of local Martha's Vineyard legend, Craig Kingsbury, and his impact on the production of Steven Spielberg’s classic movie

title: 'Girls on the hunt for "Modern Art"
overview: The first in Lux's 'Little Shits' trilogy  - Three young women visit an art museum and give their (very much) needed modern views on classic art pieces.

title: 一路走向你
overview: 影片讲述了年轻女孩海瑟（克莱因 饰）在开启她精心规划的人生之前，和闺蜜们（索菲亚·怀利与麦迪森·汤普森 饰）一起畅游欧洲的故事。一次偶然的邂逅让她与杰克之间擦出火花，并引发了一段深刻而出乎意料的情感旅程。随着秘密浮出水面、人生抉择逼近，两人的关系受到了严峻考验，也彻底改变了海瑟的命运。

title: 水中血3
overview: The finale to the Bull Shark trilogy as a family of Bull Sharks faces off against a small Texas lake community.

title: 万古剑帝
overview: 神遗大陆，百族争锋，武者为王。姜云曾是皇城天一武府武首，不想被夜天邪废掉武脉，天才变废人，不屈命运时，意外觉醒剑魂骨，在剑道之主剑妙禅的帮助下觉醒万古剑脉，成为凡尘域唯一的超凡剑修。原本打算潜心修行以便早日手刃仇人的姜云，被妻子的青梅竹马凌少风盯上，凌少风联合多个势力对付姜云，姜云为护妻子及唐家周全，奋力抵抗，最后不仅全面瓦解凌少风等恶势力，更揭开灵域企图侵占神遗大陆、灭掉人族的阴谋。为了人族的命运，姜云不得不暂时放下仇恨，与伙伴们携手抵抗灵域的攻击，共同拯救神遗大陆与保护人族。

title: 一刻千金
overview: 本剧讲述玉雕小掌柜乔鹤和金缮修复师霍听澜意外相遇，经历过“暗恋、误会、合作到互相了解、双向救赎、最终双向奔赴”，是一场文玩界暖心治愈的纯爱故事。

title: The Home Team: New York Jets
overview: In this intimate look at NFL family life, follow Tyler Conklin, C.J. Mosley, Quinnen Williams, Allen Lazard, Alijah Vera-Tucker, and Chuck Clark and their partners through a year of setbacks and breakthroughs . From fatherhood and injuries to contract pressure and uncertain futures, this series captures the heart, sacrifice, and humanity behind America's favorite game.

title: 满庭芳
overview: 将门之女苏乐虞自幼受女帝教导，与冀王殷长琰青梅竹马情谊深厚。然殷长琰逼宫上位，并娶她为妃巩固势力。苏乐虞在受封为贤妃后，依旧践行先帝遗志，为实现大沧国“不分性别，海纳百川”的政治理想而排除万难，并最终解开逼宫真相，与殷长琰以身入局，联手打破旧势力，创造大沧新格局。

title: 搏忆
overview: 《搏忆》设定为架空背景，以缉毒警察被杀害为主案件贯穿全剧。整部剧集全程高能，聚焦于人性善恶，除了抽丝剥茧般的爽感，还有真相浮出水面过程中对人性的探索。

title: 为你着迷
genres: 动画, 喜剧, 剧情
overview: 就读于初高中一体男校的江间让二，因体育祭被古怪同学林美良奇怪地纠缠上了。 在男女混校就读的目高优一，则因班上令人避之不及的阴森角色二阶堂明成了后座，心情忧郁…… 一段由青春期特有的人际关系交织而成的群像故事。

title: 头号人质
overview:
英国首相Abigail Dalton（苏兰·琼斯 Suranne Jones 饰）因医疗危机而竞选公职。Vivienne Toussaint（朱莉·德尔佩 Julie Delpy 饰）是第一位即便面临解决法国边境问题，无论如何都要竞选连任的法国女总统。

　　如果两位女性能够达成一致，那一场峰会可能会是她们渴望的答案。但当Abigail的丈夫被绑架、Vivienne遭到勒索时，她们都面临着难以想象的选择。被迫陷入激烈竞争的两人，从政前途和个人生活都可能悬而未决，她们能否齐心协力揭开威胁两人的阴谋呢？

title: 这里没信号
overview: 在这颗星球上，总有些地方没有信号。也正是那些地方，让我们重新连上自己。《这里没信号》是胡先煦首档自制旅行与谈话记录节目。胡先煦携好友王一通、陈睿博士，背上背包，远赴厄瓜多尔加拉帕戈斯群岛与亚马孙雨林——在地图尽头的岛屿和热带雨林中，重新发现生活与自己。这是一档逃离日常的旅行记录，也是一次“掉线”的集体实验。在没有热点、不设剧本的旅途中，他们聊生活与困惑、自由与选择、未来与当下；用脚步丈量陌生风景，用谈话记录当下心境。风景不是背景，而是旅程本身的答案；同伴不是游伴，而是相遇最恰当的注脚。真实的相处、意外的发现、没有预设的对话——《这里没信号》用旅行打开思考的入口，让观众看到胡先煦和朋友们在远方的真实模样。去没有信号的地方，和生活重新连线。

title: 灿烂的市集
overview: 几位期待“社交破圈”的年轻艺人，与市集策划师一起，组成“灿烂的市集策划组”。在2座城市，与明星摊主和素人摊主共同打造一场结合地方城市烟火与青春潮流的创意市集。聚焦当下青年人的兴趣生活圈层，感受松弛感和慢社交的治愈力 ，同时展现青年人的青春创意和鲜活面孔。

title: 抢个将军来压寨
overview: 外卖小哥李承御意外穿越到古代成了战神大将军。为了查明反贼一事，李承御假扮农户“卧底”进清风寨，成了寨主陈心柔的赘婿。李承御利用自己现代人的“超前思维”开启逆袭模式，一不小心还和陈心柔产生了情感羁绊……

title: 阿曼达·诺克斯杀人疑案
overview: 阿曼达·诺克斯抵达意大利留学，几周后却因谋杀罪被冤枉入狱。本片将讲述诺克斯为证明自身清白、重获自由而进行的不懈斗争，并探究当局和世界为何如此坚定地批判她。

title: Les Mascots
overview: A film student heads to NYC to document his uncle's Broadway career, only to find him living with a quirky roommate and working as a costumed character in Times Square.

title: 常安皆欢
overview: 17年前因受继母排斥被送到山上习医休养的燕皆欢，17年后为了给父亲庆祝寿辰欢喜下山，不料刚回府就再次遭遇陷害，眼见父亲惨死，而自已却被指认成了杀父凶手，她用智慧化解一场场审讯，成功让自己脱身，同时查出陷害之人就在宫中。想办法入宫后的燕皆欢遇见了同样遭遇的景王爷，两人携手查真相，惩真凶，除奸佞，覆朝堂。谱写了一曲人世殊途，有你皆欢的常安恋歌。

title: Songs & Stories with Kelly Clarkson
overview: The three-time Grammy winner will chat with Gloria Estefan, Jonas Brothers, Lizzo, and Teddy Swims about music as well as their personal lives, giving viewers a “a front-row pass” at their “unfiltered” conversations. The four-episode special will also feature musical performances in an “intimate, unplugged setting.

title: 黑月光法则
overview: 名门千金东方曦为爱隐姓埋名，打工养活渣男叶云洲，却被其背叛后觉醒。发现自己是小说恶毒女配后，她与系统打赌改命，最终在回归宴上揭穿叶云洲的真面目。当叶云洲再度纠缠时，她发现暗恋自己的大哥东方宴竟是系统化身，却在命运转折前故意输掉赌约，揭穿其隐藏多年的真心。

title: Stalking Samantha: 13 Years of Terror
overview: The docuseries tells the harrowing story of Samantha Stites, a bright college freshman who, in 2011, met Christopher Thomas. This encounter marked the beginning of an 11-year period of unsettling obsession and constant stalking by Christopher. He would stealthily and openly show up wherever Samantha went, from restaurants to grocery stores and sporting events.

title: 姐姐妹妹抓娃娃
overview: 《姐姐妹妹抓娃娃》作为一档新概念全女冒险真人秀，以“全女冒险+文化出海+真实成长”为核心理念，集结五位女推团成员戚薇、李一桐、李雪琴、田曦薇、张艺凡共同组成宇宙最强抓手团，前往奇幻国度-土耳其，开启一场融合极限挑战、文化探索与自我突破的冒险之旅。

title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury.
overview: Just a year ago Tommy Fury seemed to have it all - victory over his biggest adversary Jake Paul, love with Molly-Mae and a beautiful baby daughter, Bambi. But in his last fight he damaged his hand and, unable to train, his life span out of control. Follow Tommy Fury as he attempts to get his life back on track the only way a Fury knows how.

title: 美国之队：赌徒老板与达拉斯牛仔
overview: 从三次超级碗夺冠到一系列争议，这部纪录片剧集再现了90 年代达拉斯牛仔王朝的狂野历程。
